summary: Two women get on the highway heading to Santa Fe. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a secret: she's a fugitive from justice - accused of her mother-in-law's death.
cast: Sienna Miller|Golshifteh Farahani|Bahar Soomekh|Tim Guinee|Roschdy Zem|Chafia Boudraa|Richard Jose|Jesse Bob Harper|Sayed Badreya|Usman Ally|Doug James|Deanna Dunagan|Michael Ehlers|Aaron Walters|Loren Lazerine|Rebekah Ward|Boots Southerland|Helen Young|Tim Edward Rhoze|Will Yazzie|Jacqueline Williams|Shi Valdez|Mike Miller|Mary R. Woods|Galen Hutchinson|Kimberly Kiegel|Amy Olson|Bridget Kelly|Mathieu Schiffman|Jack Burning|Lewis Alexander|Richard Cotovsky|Kid Dynamite|Sir Walter Scott|Ronald 'Ron-Ron' Hollister|Terrence Williams|Joewaun Scott|Mary Woods|Ruben Nakai Campaña|Paolina Cimino|Lorena Fernández|Rodger Larance|Dan Latham|Francisco Peramos|Jaime Powers
keywords: belly dancing|port a potty|mobile home|sleeping in a tent
title: Just Like a Woman
